DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate various methods for estimating body composition in human subjects. Each subject is evaluated by several methods that are then compared to a criterion value. We hypothesize that the prediction method will yield the same result as the criterion value. The risks to subjects are minimal and all techniques are routinely performed.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of Methods to Estimate Body Fat
DOC.criteria: healthy male and female (premenopausal) volunteers postmenopausal and pregnant women
